More 2,434 families realize the dream of home ownership. I have just delivered #MinhaCasaMinhaVida to five states.
Caxias do Sul (RS), Sobral (CE), Três Lagoas (MS), Paracatu (MG) and Jundiaí (SP) received residential units with complete infrastructure.
My joy in participating in moments like this is immense. These families begin a new stage in their lives.
In total, we have already delivered 2.57 million homes throughout Brazil. There are another 1.62 million under construction. #MCMV
Seeing people who have always struggled a lot to receive the key to home ownership makes all the work worthwhile. #My home, my life
Many people did not believe that we could face the problem of housing for the poor. #My home, my life
We insist, we persist and we overcome the difficulties. Hj #MyMyMouseMyVida is the most successful prog. of our history.
We are a government that creates the chances and the means to make people's efforts, in fact, transform dreams into reality.
Congratulations on the achievement and good luck in the new home! #MyCasaMinhaVida https://t.co/Z3u0Jidmje
